text:
Justin Timberlake promises no wardrobe malfunctions at the 2018 Super Bowl halftime show.

Justin was asked if NFL executives touched on his last halftime show mishap with Janet Jackson and he said,
title: Justin Timberlake Promises No Wardrobe Malfunctions at 2018 Super Bowl Halftime Show

og.title: Justin Timberlake Promises No Wardrobe Malfunctions at 2018 Super Bowl Halftime Show
og.description: Justin Timberlake promises no wardrobe malfunctions at the 2018 Super Bowl halftime show. Justin was asked if NFL executives touched on his last halftime show mishap with Janet Jackson and he said, “That won’t happen this time. There was a little bit of that. But, no, that’s not going to happen.”

But, no, that’s not going to happen.”
